title: [Alasdair Gold] “Tottenham have held discussions over signing Randal Kolo Muani from PSG, with a loan deal with an option to buy mooted, although Spurs will have to fight off plenty of competition if they are to sign the 26-year-old.”
content:
The club that Bill Nicholson made.
